ai-patthana7.9:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles consisting in thoughts.
ai-patthana7.9:1.1_1: You shouldn’t give up the cause for the sake of development,
ai-patthana7.9:1.1_2: not for the sake of development nor for the sake of development,
ai-patthana7.9:1.1_3: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana7.9:2.1_0: Thirty-four grounds for a single object ...
